Reviews.Title: Love at first sight!!
Reviews.Author: Susan D'Elena
Reviews.Content: I am just a beginner and still learning but I am very satisfied with the ease and quality of my new EOS Rebel SL1.The picture quality is great.I have not found any Cons yet.  I purchased this model because I have very small hands and it fits my hands perfectly.

Reviews.Title: Awesome camera for starters!!!
Reviews.Author: Jorge Camara
Reviews.Content: It is a very nice, good quality and surprisingly awesome camera with a lots of features to get nice photos. I used to take a lot of pictures with a compact Sony camera, but when I started to get photos with this one, I was impressed on the quality of the pictures.Also, the package that I bought have everything to became an expert taking pictures.I recommend 100% this camera.

Reviews.Title: Great package
Reviews.Author: Heather D "HD"
Reviews.Content: This is a great starter package that includes everything that you need.  Wonderful camera as well.  Certainly worth the money, it is a great value.

Reviews.Title: EOS Rebel SL1
Reviews.Author: M. E. Koch "Gonfishn"
Reviews.Content: Light and easy to use - an outstanding camera. Kit is worth the money but some items are "fillers." Thanks.

Reviews.Title: Great deal!
Reviews.Author: Bernadette A. Gates
Reviews.Content: Great package.  Backpack camera case holds everything and is well padded. It was great that they included two batteries too.

Reviews.Title: met all my expectations
Reviews.Author: SOMASHEKHARA KUMARSWAMY
Reviews.Content: this is the great combo offer i received, no one else could beat this offer of 699 for canon eos sl1 with 15 items combo

Reviews.Title: Great camera at a great price!!
Reviews.Author: Jim Sagebiel
Reviews.Content: Everything in the kit was as described. Shipping on time. The camera takes wonderful pictures and has many useful functions. The small size and light weight is amazing. No complaints.

Reviews.Title: Considering Purchase
Reviews.Author: Sandy Gobrogge
Reviews.Content: I asked my friend who takes all the pictures for church, which includes all events with children, what camera she used.  This was the one!  Her pictures are beautiful whether close ups, or distant.  I am seriously looking into buying one and learning to use it before our Mediterranean cruise and four day tour.

ProductInfo.Features:
CAMETA CAMERA KIT INCLUDES 15 PRODUCTS -- All BRAND NEW Items with all Manufacturer-supplied Accessories + Full USA Warranties:
<1> Canon EOS Rebel SL1 Digital SLR Camera & EF-S 18-55mm IS STM Lens + <2> Canon EF 75-300mm III Telephoto Zoom Lens + <3> Transcend 64GB Ultimate SDXC UHS-1 Class 10 Memory Card +
<4> Spare LP-E12 Battery for Canon + <5> Battery Charger for LP-E12 + <6> Precision Design 58mm (UV/CPL/ND8) Filter Kit + <7> Vivitar 58mm UV Glass Filter +
<8> RC-6 Shutter Remote Control + <9> Precision Design 2.5x Tele & .45x Wide Auxiliary Lens + <10> Precision Design DSLR Sling Backpack + <11> Precision Design Full-Size 58" Tripod with Case +
<12> Precision Design SDHC Memory Card Reader + <13> Precision Design 6pc Complete Cleaning Kit + <14> Precision Design Memory Card Wallet + <15> LCD Monitor Screen Protectors
ProductInfo.Name: Canon EOS Rebel SL1 Digital SLR Camera & EF-S 18-55mm IS STM Lens with EF 75-300mm III Lens + 64GB Card + Battery + Backpack + 2 Lenses + Accessory Kit
